question: Hi. How much po magpa dry clean ng gown ?
answer:
Our gown cleaning rates for a simple gown cleaning start at Php 500. 🙂 

However, the price may vary depending on the details of the gown.  Please send us the following so we can give you the best price:  
1. Full-body photo 
2. Close-up photo of the details 
3. Fabric type (if known) 
4. Dimensions (length of dress and train) 
5. Description from the designer (if available) 
6. How many layers of fabric  

See the photo for our gown drycleaning price guide: https://drive.google.com/file/d/163Fv4c8oH2uau7MXwbNlljvigclE2zjo/view?usp=drive_link

question: Meron po pick up and delivery?
answer:
We do pick-up and delivery for your safety and convenience.😊

Kindly send us your contact number + location and our staff will get in touch with you.🧡

🛵TRY SUDS LAUNDRYNOW: https://laundrynow.suds.com.ph/
1. Select the service you need
2. Confirm your pick-up details and MOP
3. All set! Just wait for our confirmation

🛵FOR ON-DEMAND PICK-UP:
In partnership with Grab and Lalamove, we can arrange booking for you or you can book yourself.
*Fees apply to respective rate cards.

🛵FOR SCHEDULED PICK-UP:
Our own vehicle will arrange the pick-up
*Fee is P75/way 

❓NEED A LAUNDRY BAG
Buy here in advance!
🧡Contactless Bag: https://bit.ly/3jPkHOV
🧡LaundryNow Bag: https://bit.ly/3pOsdO2

Read https://suds.com.ph/laundrynow/ for more info.

Note: Items exceeding the maximum 8kg per bag will be charged per kilo.

Call 0933-866-2216 NOW to arrange your booking.
